commitResults.messageTitle: Rename Duke to Waz and add greetings
commitResults.messageBody:
To differentiate from the placeholder name Duke, the main class has been renamed to Waz. This gives the chatbot's unique identity.

Implemented a skeletal version of Waz that greets and exit.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add echo command and exit on 'bye'
commitResults.messageBody:
Chatbot can echo back any commaned entered by the user, exit when the user types 'bye'

Enhances user engagement.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add any text into list and refactor to use switch for commands
commitResults.messageBody: Implemented an arraylist to store text, display list in numbered order when 'list' command is issued. Replace if/else with a switch statement for easier future expansion of commands.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add task class with ability to mark and unmark tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
-Added task class to represent each task
-Added mark and unmark command to update task status
-Updated list display [x] or [ ] as well as message to make it user-friendly

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for tracking three types of tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
Implemented Todo, Deadline, and Event classes extending Task
User input will create different task accordingly
Updated echo method to display confirmation message with task count
Updated echo method code to use switch and improved input validation by handling invalid commands
Remove a spacing from the echo method. This ensures that the actual result and expected matches.All test case passed.

Ensure all task has a description
Mark/Unmark to be in range of the list
Validate presence of /from and /to
Throw WazException with clear messages for each error
Adding error messages will help the user better understand what to input.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for deleting tasks from the lists
commitResults.messageBody:
Implemented delete command
Prints confirmation message of task deleted
Updates and displays remaining tasks
Handles invalid input with clear error messages
